import sys
import json
import requests
import networkx as nx
import numpy as np
import pickle
import time

import pandas
miuser = tuple(pandas.read_csv("fr-166151.csv", header=0).vk)

url0 = "https://api.vk.com/method/"


regenerate = True
if regenerate:
    for i in range(len(miuser)):
        #time.sleep(1)
        url = url0 + "friends.get?user_id=" + str(miuser[i])
        (users) = ([])
        #time.sleep(1)
        try:
            val = json.loads(requests.get(url+"&offset=").text)['response']
            a=0
            for j in val:
                #time.sleep(1)
                print (str(miuser[i]) + ';' + str(val.pop()))
        except Exception:
            print(str(miuser[i])+';'+str('0') )
